      • canMakeOrder

        public void canMakeOrder(java.time.LocalTime time,
                         java.time.LocalDate dateOfVisit,
                         java.lang.String wantedPark,
                         java.lang.String type,
                         int numOfVisitors)
        Description canMakeOrder(LocalTime time, LocalDate dateOfVisit, String wantedPark, String type, int numOfVisitors) This method will check with the db if there is a place in the park for this time and date got if so, will create new order, and save it later in the DB. will check first if there is an order for the current time
        Parameters:
        time - - The time of the wanted visit
        dateOfVisit - - The date of the wanted visit
        wantedPark - - The park of the wanted visit
        type - - The type of the visitors who make the order
        numOfVisitors - - The number of visitors who want to create an order anything.

      • checkValidValues

        public boolean checkValidValues(java.lang.String phone,
                                java.lang.String email)
        Description of checkValidValues(String phone, String email) check if the phone and numbers are valid will check if the phone containing 10 digits. will check if all the string of the phone is not a char but a number if will find a char there will enter to the cache.
        Parameters:
        phone - - the phone that gets from the screen
        email - = the email that gets from screen
        Returns:
        boolean true or false, if all is valid or not

      • checkIfCanMakeOrder

        public void checkIfCanMakeOrder(java.lang.String[] msg)
                         throws java.io.IOException
        Description checkIfCanMakeOrder(String[] msg) This method get from the server all the numbers how many can enter how many visitors overall in the gap if adding will make the maxVisit bigger, move to unapproved order, if not, will put into the variable true, and make the order confirmed
        Parameters:
        msg[1] - - currentVisitors that allows
        msg[2] - - availableVisitors in the park
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - - exe

        public void cancelOrder(java.lang.String dateOfVisit,

        dateOfVisit - - the date of the visit that need to be canceled
        wantedPark - - the wanted park of the visit that need to be canceled
        timeOfVisit - - the time of the visit that need to be canceled.

        wantedPark - - the Wanted park name

      • havingAlert

        public boolean havingAlert(java.time.LocalDate tomorrow,
                           java.lang.String ID)
        Description of havingAlert(LocalDate tomorrow, String ID) method that will check if tomorrow there will be any order this is not counting how many orders, its just check if there are some this method will be used in the welcome traveller initialize, and if it will be true, it will pop up a message saying he need to confirm his orders that are going to be tomorrow
        Parameters:
        tomorrow - - the date of tomorrow
        ID - - the Id of the user
        Returns:
        boolean - true or false if the user already got the message of not
